name: BLOCK-T360
configuration_schema:
$schema: http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#
title: BLOCK-T360 configuration
description: Configuration for BLOCK-T360.
type: object
properties:
  program:
    description: Name of program
    type: string
    default: BLOCK-T360
  ignore:
    description: Name of the CSCs we want to ignore
    type: array
    default: ['TunableLaser','CBP','Electrometer:101','Electrometer:102']
